game_description: Mission X is a VR Laser tag experience that you can turn any open space into a VR arena with all the fun and excitement of a traditional laser tag/ laser quest venue. *Create your own immersive free-roam VR arena: https://youtu.be/KrXlsp6v2w4 Featuring: Explore variety of gaming environments as a soldier; and with your teammates, combat against the other teams in a number of different game modes. -Multi game maps in multi arenas size -Calorie consumption tracking -Solo fight back Corona Virus or with friends & family multiplayer -Tournament software integrated -bHaptics vest integrated Note: *With shared-space, co-location system, you need big space and need to both be inhabiting the same space in order to play it.
review_2: Absolutely the best for room scale environment, the #1 for VR premises. Stable, fast to learn, zero lag, professional and super fast support, everyday growing in new features and scenarios. We are using it from the first release, 2020, and there are no other similar. Thanks Holomia.
review_3: I have enough space to play but I don't have any friends with VR add Online Multiplayer
review_5: This game asks for a minimum 13 x 13 ft play area and there's no way for you to "find a server" like other games. The game requires you to move within your play space rather than with a stick. The video implies that this game is likely meant to be played in an arena setting with all players in the same room.
